item.title: Meta’s New Smart Glasses Could Expose Your Company to Legal and Compliance Risks
item.description: Using AI-connected cameras on your face could transform many jobs, but they’ll see and remember everything the wearer does at work.

item.title: This Survey Found Workers Would Really Like to Have AI Workplace Friendships
item.description: In our lonely era, maybe an AI version of a co-worker can become a best friend at work, or help you find one.

item.title: Nvidia Is Investing $100 Billion in OpenAI as AI Datacenter Competition Grows
item.description: OpenAI will pay Nvidia in cash for chips, and Nvidia will invest in OpenAI for non-controlling shares, according to a source.

item.title: Google faces antitrust déjà vu as US seeks to break up its digital advertising business

item.title: Charlie Kirk had a message for the over 2 million unemployed Gen Z NEET men: You don’t need college to make your dreams happen
